coreAttributes.name: FAUXMAS
coreAttributes.description: A bullpup assault rifle which uses a delayed blowback operating system and carries a 25-round magazine. It functions best with French-specified steel-casing 5.56Ã—45mm ammunition, and has a very high rate of fire at 1,100 rounds per minute. It is also known as Le Clairon.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Use your FAUXMAS to fire a single bullet at your target.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] out [npc.her] FAUXMAS, inserts a magazine, and pulls the charging handle, putting it into a state where it's ready to be used in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText:
Taking aim with [npc.her] FAUXMAS, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger and [npc.verb(fire)] a bullet at [npc2.name], hitting [npc2.herHim] directly in the chest!
Thankfully, there seems to be some kind of arcane force preventing [npc2.name] from being seriously wounded or killed...

missDescriptions.missText: Taking aim with [npc.her] FAUXMAS, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger and fires a bullet at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
